content: stitch after the corner on the previous round so always move the corner slightly to work that first stitch this stitch is counted as the first stitch unless you are asked to skip the hidden st only skip the hidden stitch where i ve indicated to do so sometimes a stitch may also be hidden further into a round we have tried to mention it where possible 5 tu t ori als double_crochet two together decrease over 2 stitches yo insert the hook into the first indicated stitch and pull up a loop 3 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops 2 loops on the hook yo insert the hook into the second indicated stitch and pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on the hook yo pull through all 3 loops 6 tu t ori als double_crochet three together dc3tog over 3 stitches yo insert the hook into the first indicated stitch and pull up a loop 3 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops 2 loops on the hook yo insert the hook into the second indicated stitch and pull up a loop 4 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops 3 loops on the hook yo insert the hook into the third indicated stitch and pull up a loop 5 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops 4 loops on the hook yo pull through all 4 loops on the hook 7 8 tu tori als extended front post double_crochet ex-fpdc yo insert the hook from the front around the back of the post of the indicated stitch and pull up a loop yo pull through 1 loop only yo pull through 2 loops twice 9 tu tori als needle join nj work your last st as normal pull up a loop and remove your hook thread the tail onto a needle work the tail through the loop and finish your stitch don t pull the loop too tight thread the tail under both loops of the second stitch of the round thread the tail back through the top of the last stitch gently close the loop until it forms a false loop over the first stitch stitch your tail end away securely https //www youtube com/channel/ucb-qnxtdt5f7xcqhzp2jt3q/videos 10 tu t ori als standing front post double_crochet standing fpdc begin with a slip knot on your hook yo hold the loops in place with your fingers insert the hook from the front around the back of the post of the indicated stitch and pull up a loop 3 loops on the hook yo pull through 2 loops twice 11 tu t ori als surface slip_stitch surface slip_stitch begin by inserting your hook through your work where you would like to begin make a slip knot on your hook your slip knot should be at the back of your work pull your hook up through your work so your hook with 1
